summary: A collection of bat files for custom spells created by awesome moders
descriptionHtml:
this is my simple contribution to the modding community, a bat file for custom spells, take note that you would need the actual mod for the bat files to work, if you do not have them installed it will not work

SUPPORTED MODS:
SkyRe (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286//?)
Forgotten magic redone (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35339//?)

HOW TO MAKE IT WORK:
place the txt files in either your data folder or skyrim folder then in game open the console command and type \"bat forgotten\" for forgotten magic redone and \"bat skyretomes\" for SkyRe without quotations 

More to come

Credit goes to the respective authors of the mods

SORRY FOR MY ENGLISH, NOT AMERICAN NOR NATIVE SPEAKER OF THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE
author: JaypeeParungao
